Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Cool Weapon

Bingo Square [9]

At least one main character uses a weapon with magical properties. HARD MODE: Weapon has a unique name. Examples: Excalibur from Arthurian legend, Dragnipur in Malazan, Sting in Lord of the Rings, etc.

Title Author Hard Mode
Aching God Mike Shel
Against a Dark Background Iain M. Banks
All the Stars and Teeth Adalyn Grace
Ashes of the Sun Django Wexler
Bloody Rose Nicholas Eames
Book of Swords Fred Saberhagen
